Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

So I build a verbal inspired Concorde and I was getting some figures before I released it (range, ceiling altitude, etc...) and when I landed it after it ran out of fuel, some glitch happened while i was in the Map view and the craft blew up. I didn't get to find out the aircraft's range unfortunately. But I landed on a small island in the middle of the ocean and I was wondering if any might know distance wise how far is it from the KSC.
Without me physically checking, i wuld guess it to be at least 150 km
I'd gamble around 700km, based on a mission I did to the mountains south-west of that being 620

I just did a little math with a proportion of length in cm between the KSC and the island. I god 566km so i'm going to say its around 600km since Eddiew's prediction was the closest. Thank you to the three of you for your help.
